title: mkvmerge identification output
description: The JSON output produced by mkvmerge's file identification mode

recognized.description: States whether or not mkvmerge knows about the format

supported.description: States whether or not mkvmerge can read the format

type.description: A human-readable description/name for the container format

properties.description: additional properties for the container varying by container format

container_type.description: A unique number identifying the container type that's supposed to stay constant over all future releases of MKVToolNix

is_providing_timecodes.description: States whether or not the container has timestamps for the packets (e.g. Matroska, MP4) or not (e.g. SRT, MP3)

segment_uid.description: A hexadecimal string of the segment's UID (only for Matroska files)

next_segment_uid.description: A hexadecimal string of the next segment's UID (only for Matroska files)

previous_segment_uid.description: A hexadecimal string of the previous segment's UID (only for Matroska files)

playlist.description: States whether or not the identified file is a playlist (e.g. MPLS) referring to several other files

playlist_chapters.description: The number of chapters in a playlist if it is a one

playlist_duration.description: The total duration in nanoseconds of all files referenced by the playlist if it is a one

playlist_size.description: The total size in bytes of all files referenced by the playlist if it is a one
